ViewTransitionUpdateCallbackDone.summary:
The updateCallbackDone read-only property of the
interface is a {{jsxref("Promise")}} that fulfills when the promise returned by the 's callback fulfills, or rejects when it rejects.

remarks.para: updateCallbackDone is useful when you don't care about the success/failure of the transition animation, and just want to know if and when the DOM is updated.
-Smooth and simple transitions with the View Transitions API
